subtitle: Post to unlock the world
post_photo: Post one photo to unlock the global feed.
logout_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
invalid_phone: Please enter a valid phone number
feed_lock: To see the feed you must first post a photo for today's prompt.
daily_prompt_description: Everyone gets the same daily theme, with a limited time to participate.
photo_to_unlock_description: Post one photo to unlock the global feed.
post_to_unlock_feed_description: Only after sharing your photo you will be able to see others'. Fair play!
no_filters_more_authenticity_description: Snap and share your point of view without excess.
banner_text: Only after your response to the stimulus can you see how others have responded.
intro: Every day brings a new stimulus: a gentle invitation to look around, to feel, and—if you want—to respond. No rush. No posing. Just truth.
eyes_meet_desc: After your shot, discover how the world interpreted the same stimulus.
not_a_task_desc: It’s an invitation, not an obligation. If it doesn’t speak to you, put down your phone and come back later.
present_desc: Capture the moment as you read. That instant is enough.
authenticity_desc: No heavy filters, no masks: natural light, imperfections, reality.
freedom_desc: No chase for numbers. Reactions are for understanding, not judging.
clarity_desc: Show enough, explain little. A sincere fragment says more than a hundred words.
live_desc: Respond with a photo taken right now. No gallery: let the present speak.
free_desc: There’s no right answer: capture a moment that, for you, fits today’s stimulus.
feel_desc: A detail, an object, a place, a face—whatever makes you think of today’s stimulus.
no_obligation_desc: If it doesn’t move you, no worries: put down the phone and live your day.
post_only_if_moved: Post only if the prompt sparks something in you. Otherwise, put down your phone and enjoy your day.
